lead_paragraph: KEIDAN--Juliet. Harvard Hillel notes with sadness the passing of Juliet Keidan, mother of our dear friend David Keidan. Our hearts are uplifted hearing of her long and fruitful life. We wish David and his family comfort and consolation in Juliet's memory, amid all mourners of Zion and Jerusalem.
